StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCollegeVisit]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegeVisitID uniqueiden..er, @CollegeVisitName varchar(100), @CollegeVisitDesc varchar(100), @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].CollegeVisit cv where cv.CollegeVisitID = @CollegeVisitID) -- the update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisit] SET -- user is not allowed to update CollegeVisitID [CollegeVisitName] = @CollegeVisitName, [CollegeVisitDesc] = @CollegeVisitDesc, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate() WHERE CollegeVisitID = @CollegeVisitID
END --- ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisit] ([CollegeVisitName],[CollegeVisitDesc], [UserLogin],[UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegeVisitName, @CollegeVisitDesc, @UserLogin,GetDate()) END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
